org.esupportail.commons.services.ldap
Class SearchableLdapUserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.esupportail.commons.services.ldap.SearchableLdapUserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, BasicLdapService, LdapUserService, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
public class SearchableLdapUserServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements LdapUserService, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, java.io.Serializable

An implementation of LdapUserService that delegates to a CachingLdapEntityServiceImpl.
